Term::Table::CellStack(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation Term::Table::CellStack(3)

NAME

Term::Table::CellStack - Combine several cells into one (vertical)

DESCRIPTION

This package is used to represent a merged-cell in a table (vertical).

SOURCE

The source code repository for Term-Table can be found at http://github.com/exodist/Term-Table/.

MAINTAINERS
